disease: Malignant neoplasm of connective and soft tissue, unspecified

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: May be present or absent; can range from mild to severe depending on location and extent of tumor

symptoms.name: Mass
symptoms.pattern: Palpable lump or swelling; size and location vary

symptoms.name: Weakness
symptoms.pattern: Muscle weakness due to tumor infiltration

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.pattern: General feeling of tiredness and lack of energy

vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated in advanced stages
vital_signs.blood_pressure: May be elevated in advanced stages

imaging_findings.CT scan: May show mass and extent of involvement
imaging_findings.MRI: May show mass, extent of involvement, and relationship to surrounding structures
imaging_findings.PET scan: May show metabolic activity of the tumor

required: Histological confirmation of malignant neoplasm of connective or soft tissue
supportive: Imaging findings consistent with a malignant neoplasm
Clinical symptoms and signs suggestive of a malignant neoplasm

differential_diagnoses: Benign neoplasms of connective and soft tissue
